QuestData.Title: Peering Into the Past
QuestData.Description: Just a moment, now. Allow me to gather my things.$b$bWouldn't want me to lose these notes now, would we? Especially after you risked life and limb for them!$b$bThere, all set. Let us be off, shall we?$b$bI must say, I feel much safer traveling with you after seeing how you handled that saurok!
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Lorewalker Cho at the Circle of Stone.

Objectives.Objective: Lorewalker Cho escorted to Circle of Stone
